Author: heavensuperman
Title: [ICO][ANN] ⭐️XeniaCoin ⭐️ - All Africa in one token
Body: Cryptocurrency accepted: BTC, ETH, USD, EUR, ZAR, NGN, GSH Since Xenia coin is an ERC-20 token, you will need to have an e-wallet that can support the token. Six38ppn will send the Xenia tokens to the same account that sent the money to purchase the token. There will be a public key presented on the platform once the ICO is launched. All you need to do is register for an account and send an equivalent amount to the public account. In moments, you will receive the Xenia tokens allotted to you through the same e-wallet and for fiat payments after a KYC approval your token will be funded to the designated wallet. This will prevent people from stealing the tokens of others.  The total token supply of Xenia coins will be capped at 200 million tokens. Out of this 25 percent of the tokens will be allocated during the main ICO. An additional 10 percent is set aside for the cost of the ICO, 7.5 will be used to support the project while the remaining 67.5 percent will be reserved in escrow. The main aim of the ICO is to raise funds for the raiding of assets, 90% of the platform development has been initialized by the founder.

Author: heavensuperman
Title: [ICO][ANN] ⭐️XeniaCoin ⭐️ - All Africa in one token
Body: All new technology seems to go through a similar phase. In 1995, many people believed that email will never catch on and the world would be fine using fax machines. In 2000, when internet was already 10 years, it did not work in many people’s homes. Most people didn’t have access to emails, most did not know what a browser was or a website, not to talk of URL. Now everyone understands all that stuff without a problem. It is not a surprise that many people are still skeptical about cryptocurrency and its underlying technology up till now. Very soon people will wake up to meet cryptocurrency and blockchain become an everyday style. All these terminologies like hashrate, hot wallet, cold wallet, xeniacoin, xeniaride, exchange and even the word ‘fiat’ will become second nature to everyone. Reading the xeniacoin white paper, one would realize it is not hard to envisage the future of #xeniacoin. If you have not seen the whitepaper, click #xeniacoin.org and see for yourself. We all understand the fear of being scammed but must everything be scam? There are still people with integrity in the cryptospace and willing to educate you on this disruptive technology and how to position yourself for a future in this sphere. Blockchain, xeniacoin has not even started making waves. Investment into cryptocurrency is ever-growing. This is not likely to change any time soon. More people are learning about cryptocurrency, blockchain and how the technology is used. The bulls are arriving in the #xeniacoin space gradually. There is no better time to grab xeniacoin than now. Some of the projects have already started without ending the #ICO. What can stop anyone from this great opportunity. Sign Up today at #xeniacoin.org.

Author: heavensuperman
Title: [ICO][ANN] ⭐️XeniaCoin ⭐️ - All Africa in one token
Body: XENIA TELLER/TAXI RIDE- Our Live Project:  This is a mobile application that serves as a peer2peer send and receive remittance service of the six38 platform. This peer-to-peer payment is instant to anyone in the world and connects Xenia users with a network of physical locations closest to them where they can either add or withdraw cash to/from their Xenia Teller wallet, in addition a full functional exchange can be accessed through the application. Within the Xenia Teller app one is able to call up a ride just like any other taxi ride share application but payment is settled in digital currency primarily XENIACOIN or any other currency we designate from the wallet of the app (this function reduces the fee for the drivers, instead of the traditional 15-25% charged by competing applications only 5% is charged to the driver and 3% is banked in a serving wallet for the rider, this way both the driver and the rider are incentivized. Any person or store with verifiable details and location can sign up as an XENIA TELLER, that means they become a payment gate way to and from the Xenia Teller wallet benefiting a fee not more than 2% of the transaction cost with a total cap limit of chargeable fee determined by our application. Download:  Xenia teller playstore: https://bit.ly/2GWXsNq Xenia driver playstore: https://bit.ly/2qs6E6p Xenia Teller Appstore: https://apple.co/2GDNF2E Xenia Driver Appstore: https://apple.co/2GIabDm

They are planning to introduce next-gen ATMs for providing full-service terminals; interacting with these ATMs will become more streamlined once they are integrated with XENIA prepaid cards. This card allows the investors to make a safe, easy, quick withdrawal of the funds stored on the Six38ppn platform. Title: [ICO][ANN] ⭐️XeniaCoin ⭐️ - All Africa in one token
Body: Is it not interesting that the most radical changes the internet has introduced so far has been the disintermediation of the travel and entertainment industries, with music and film revolutionized in its distribution and pricing. YET, in banking and payments, the only real innovation until recently was PayPal. And PayPal is not really an innovation in banking and payments, but just an extra layer on top of the existing banking and payment infrastructure. Paul Volcker, the former US Federal Reserve chief scored a point when he said that the Last great innovation in the banking sector was the ATM machine.  it is high time Blockchain became mainstream and payments become as fast as information. There is no point sending information from point A to B so easily yet money cannot travel that way. XENIA had identified one problem and in solving it using xenia teller. With xenia teller remittance is hassle free. XENIA teller is a platform that will allow for extremely low transfer fees while also empowering vibrant Africans who serve as the point of exchange between the sender and the receiver. A total win-win situation for all. Watch this: In the 1970s was the mainframe In the 1980s was the personal computers (PC) In the 1990s was the internet In the 2000s came the Social mobile In 2010s the blockchain and cryptocurrency arrived. The current paradigm is the connected world of computing, relying on blockchain. XENIA COIN is based on an Ethereum blockchain that supports ERC20 standard based smart contracts. It is intended for use on Six38Peer2Peer Network as the major exchange currency with business focus being Africa.  Xeniacoin is currently holding its ICO. Author: posiandu
Title: [ICO][ANN] ⭐️XeniaCoin ⭐️ - All Africa in one token
Body: XeniaCoin Xenia coin acts as the digital currency of all the offerings of the platform our Venture Capital Platform here www.six38ppn.com        ICO         [06 Apr, 2018 - 25 May, 2018]         Bonus 20%   ICO         [26 May, 2018 - 23 Jun, 2018]         Bonus 15%   ICO         [24 Jun, 2018 - 24 Jul, 2018]         Bonus 5%  [Soft cap: $25,000,000]  [Hard cap: $100,000,000]   ABSTRACT  XENIACOIN (xen) is an asset-backed cryptocurrency that’s been designed specifically to provide a safer, more accessible gateway to cryptocurrency investment than is currently available. XENIACOIN is the primary digital token used on the SIX38PPN platform (www.six38ppn.com). On this platform, no other form of digital currency or fiat money will be accepted for transactions. The Six38Peer2Peer Network is an independent venture capital platform that integrates a9 interdependent subsections which are:  1. Coin exchange (Six38CoinTrader Pty Ltd (2017/329360/07) 2. An online cooperative (SIX38 REACH OUT PRIMARY CO-OPERATIVE LIMITED (2017/008069/24) 3. Six38cryptostore 4. Commodity Brands (six38CBEI) 5. XENIA CAPITAL (mining and the real estate), 6. A Digital Coin Lending Platform (XENIACOIN LENDING), 7. A Peer2Peer Remittance service (XENIA TELLER & MARKETTRADE TELLER), 8. A Lottery Pool (XENIADRAW), Gaming/sport bets (XENIABETS), 9. A Mining POOL (SIX38MINING POOL i.e. For mining other alternative digital currencies), and Petroleum product trade (SIX38PPT)  XENIACOIN is based on ETH blockchain, which integrates Smart Contract technology and ERC20 standard. As an ETH token and an open protocol for decentralized exchange on the Ethereum blockchain. It is intended for use on the Six38Peer2Peer Network as the major exchange currency and it presents a value proposition that is second to none for all holders of the coin. XENIACOIN allows its owners to diversify their portfolio, it enables asset owners to unlock the value of assets by creating and selling their asset tokens. The SIX38PPN platform (www.six38ppn.com) extends liquidity and stringency of assets, and reduces transaction costs. It provides XENIACOIN holders with stringency price discovery and diversification across multiple asset classes as it allows the creation or listing of third party asset tokens compliant with the SIX38PPN platform disclosure and legal structure rules. An investment in XENIACOIN is one targeted for the future today. Because the business focus of the Six38Peer2Peer Network is on Africa, you are sure of laying hold on one of the most lucrative markets in the world through the various investment assets engaged on the Six38Peer2Peer Network. Indeed, bitcoin and cryptocurrencies maybe at their infancy but there is no better time than now to take advantage of the enormous opportunity that beckons. The SIX38PPN Platform is truly revolutionary. In this whitepaper, we’ll cover the Essentials of the system - describing both the architecture of the platform, and we will also take a look at the Roadmap for future evolution of the platform, introduce proposed aspects and features, and examine the potential macroeconomic benefits of investing in this paradigm-shifting offer.    XENIA PREPAID CARD / ATM  One of the challenges facing cryptocurrency investors specifically from the African region is the inability to convert their cryptocurrency to fait money instantaneously and easily and to breach this gap we have concluded agreements and signed an NDA with a certified Visa card issuer that has coverage specifically for Africa, they are compliant with all Visa’s policies and this will ensure the safety and integrity of our payment system via visa prepaid cards through out Africa. The Prepaid card will allow our users to spend their cryptocurrency anywhere that VISA or Mastercard are accepted as a method of payment. Cards can be used to shop online, swipe at a store, and even to withdraw cash at ATMs across Africa and beyond.    ATM  Analysts anticipate ATMs will become even more popular and forecast an increase in the number of ATM withdrawals. ATMs of the future are likely to be full-service terminals instead of or in addition to traditional bank tellers. It was also reported that the ATM market is expected to garner $21.9 billion by 2020, registering a CAGR (Compound Annual Growth Rate) of 7.7% during the forecast period 20152020. In the bid to make our investors have total control of their funds in the most simplified and secured manner and increase the scope of our income. One of our future objectives is to set up our ATM (Automated Teller Machine) that will be used by our investors as well as others to perform financial transactions, particularly cash withdrawal, without the need for any conversion. One may wonder why we intend to invest in the ATM market, this implies that we seek to make our investors more comfortable as well increase revenue for our founding partners who will be given the sole dealership to run our ATMs.       XENIACOIN LENDING This is an exclusive cryptocurrency lending platform for investors who are interested in diversifying their investment specifically in cloud mining/ masternode contracts. The platform will be exclusively accessed from the SIX38PPN Dashboard. This investment option involves profiting daily/weekly from six38ppn market performance in altcoin mining and Master nodes, upon investment term completion, our investors will receive their CAPITAL BACK to take out from the XENIACOIN lending platform or optionally reinvest back in XENIACOIN lending platform to continue receiving daily/weekly profit. A breakdown of the Lending interest will be available on the xenia lending platform.     ROADMAP  [Q1, 2016] SIX38PPN VC CONCEPT IDEA -Q1 SIX38PPN VC CONCEPT DRAFT -Q1  [Q3, 2016] SIX38 PRIMARY CO-COPERATIVE DRAFT, XENIACOIN IDEA  [Q1, 2017] TECH TEAM FORMATION FOR VCP & BLOCKCHAIN DEVELOPMENT  [Q4, 2017] FIRST TEST CENTER OF ALTCOIN MINING  [15 Feb, 2018] XENIACOIN PRE ICO  [01 Mar, 2018] 1st ROUND XENIACOIN CROWD SALE  [Q1, 2018] XENIA TELLER/XENIA DRIVER APP LAUNCH ON PLAY STORE  [23 Apr, 2018] 2nd Round CROWD SALE  [23 May, 2018] 3rd Round CROWD SALE  [23 Jun, 2018] 4th Round CROWD SALE  [Q2, 2018] XENIA TELLER/XENIA DRIVER APP LAUNCH ON ALL STORE SIX38CRYPTO MALL LAUNCH SIX38CRYPTO PHASE 2 XENIA DRAW/BETS LAUNCH XENIA LENDING PLATFORM LAUNCH XENIA PREPAID CARDS XENIACOIN WALLET FULLY ACTIVATE  [25 Jul, 2018] 5th Round CROWD SALE  [Q3, 2018] XENIACOIN LISTING ON EXTERNAL EXCHANGES FIRST MOVIE ROLL-OUT-BLOCKCHAIN    Our whitepaper: Download Our Official  channels and groups: Facebook  |  Twitter  |  Telegram  |  YouTube  |  BOUNTY HTTPS://WWW.XENIACOIN.ORG

The first four decades of the internet brought us e-mail, the world-wide web, dot-coms, social media, the mobile web and cloud computing. This has been great for reducing cost of research, collaboration and exchanging information. The internet has enabled many positive changes, but it has a serious limitation for businesses and economic activities. With the internet, we can’t still reliably establish one another’s identities or trust one another to transact and exchange money without validation from a third party like the banks or the government. This same intermediary collect our data and invade our privacy for commercial gains and national securities. The economic and political benefit has only channeled power and prosperity to those who already have them. Money is making more money, than people do. In 2008, while the global financial industry was crashing, a pseudonymous person, persons or group of persons named Satoshi Nakamoto outlined a new protocol for a peer-to-peer electronic cash system using a cryptocurrency called bitcoin. Now with this new system and the technology behind it -Blockchain- a world of new possibilities has opened. The manner in which wealth is distributed has taken a U-turn. Author: heavensuperman
Title: [ICO][ANN] ⭐️XeniaCoin ⭐️ - All Africa in one token
Body: Six38ppn the Venture Capital platform of #xenia, will diversify the funds that will be raised during the #ico, funds will be designated to short term projects, medium term projects and long-term projects with this mix #xeniacoin token holders will receive weekly dividend payments for the portion of funds that is designated to very short-term projects, project updates and progress of each project will be posted on the six38ppn platform. All dividend payments will be paid in Ether. To make sure that the transaction fees do not exceed the payout amount or represent a big part of the payout, we will automatically set minimum payouts based on the transaction fees. Example: a token holder whose payout would be one USD would not receive their payment if the transaction fee were one USD. Instead, the payment would be held until the following week or until the payment amount reached a level where transaction fees did not eat the profits.

Author: heavensuperman
Title: [ICO][ANN] ⭐️XeniaCoin ⭐️ - All Africa in one token
Body: One new development in the crypto space that has the potential of disrupting traditional banking and finance is peer-2-peer lending, also known as market place lending. This is an arrangement where people who have funds to invest are matched with borrowers without the service of the traditional lender such as the bank. Any individual or company can use this system, as long as they have funds to invest or need to borrow. It is a system that works using a platform that acts as an intermediary between lenders and borrowers. This way, banks are disintermediated. This platform then play a critical role in peer -2-peer financing and traditional credit scoring is replaced by systems which assess creditworthiness and trustworthiness through analysis of certain variables. These platforms not only connect potential lenders to borrowers, they provide a space in which borrowers can pitch their business plans to lenders directly and in so doing the information asymmetries evident in traditional banking is reduced and these are done without any geographical barriers.  The xenia lending platform is such that operates this way.it is a cryptocurrency lending platform for investors who are interested in diversifying their investment. The platform is exclusively accessed from the six38ppn dashboard www.six38ppn.com and the local currency used on the platform is #xeniacoin. Investment option involves profiting daily or weekly from the six38ppn performance in altcoin mining and Master nodes. Investors will receive capital back to take out from the #xeniacoin lending platform or reinvest pack in the same platform to continue receiving daily or weekly profit.

Author: heavensuperman
Title: [ICO][ANN] ⭐️XeniaCoin ⭐️ - All Africa in one token
Body: BE AN EARLY ADOPTER. In such a short period of time, the advancement of technology has been nothing less than astounding. It has caused a seismic shift in many areas of society beyond the business world. In 1993, when the first web browser and progenitor of the internet was released, the internet gained traction. Early adopters came on scene, created their own web pages, browsed existing pages, sent emails and even instant messages (IM)- THE INTERNET HAD ARRIVED. By late 1990s, many of the kings of ecommerce were ironed out. Yahoo!, AOL, go.com etc. they evangelized the flexibility and power of web portals. They did not only provide the ability to browse the web, they allowed users to easily view and customise their emails, news, information etc. and finally there was a one stop shopping, online stores. All kinds of startups promised to re-wire every imaginable industry using the internet. Then, google came and changed the whole game with exponentially better search experience. By early 2000s, early adopters of the internet like amazon, eBay, google, etc. emerged as victors in the internet age. Today these names have become a household names BUT these early adopters have gone home with their profits before all other startups came on scene. Historians can tell this type of revolution has happened before and will keep happening, as long as day and night does not cease. Today Blockchain has arrived and is here to stay. Any company that will align itself with solving problems and engaging quality contents, will be the game changers. Xeniacoin has strategically positioned itself as such. Many get in as speculators and that is normal with any market, some remain observers and I would dare to say this is a sad place to be,when years from now an observer will be telling the story but never benefited from the evolution of the technology. Some become early adopters, engaging with the use of the technology.  We at xenia are not just early adopters of the blockchain technology but investors of this disruptive concept, We invite you to take your place as an investor and an early adopter with us. We have set in progress a multifaceted ecosystem with working platforms. Your early positioning will mean an immediate value return once the ICO ends. Make xeniacoin your coin. Make Africa proud. Take advantage of the bonuses while it last! Visit #xeniacoin.org.
